items.title: Acer’s Aspire 14 AI Intel-powered Copilot+ PC is nearly 50% off today at $460 (Reg. $880)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops one of Acer’s Aspire 14 AI Copilot+ PCs down to $459.99 shipped. This Intel-powered laptop typically goes for $880, although it has more recently been fetching close to $600 at Amazon. Today’s deal delivers a 47% discount, shaving $420 off its usual going rate to knock it further down to one of the lowest prices we have tracked for it to date. Only once before today have we seen this Copilot+ PC go for less, and it’s now within just $20 of that price. It’s a good option to consider if you’re in the market to buy a new, compact laptop for everyday use, and you can learn more about it below.
